comment:
Not a bad dram, but not great.  Drinking the 40% ABV version.   

Nose:  Islay peat, slight fruity sweetness, malt.

Taste: Peat but on the ashy, slightly bitter side.  Some barley sweetness.  Very watery and poor texture.  The finish is short and quickly transitions the above notes into a watery nothingness.  

For $18, I'd expect nothing more.
Ruikt rokerig maar smaakt vrij milt
Reminded me of peat with water in a glass.
Heavy peated indeed. Yet nothing more, quick to finish, quick to forget.
Not a bad weekday Scotch. On par with Johnnie Double Black
